What features would you like to see in a: As a small business owner, I would like to see a digital banking service that offers personalized insights and recommendations based on my spending habits. It would be great if the service could help me categorize my expenses automatically and provide easy-to-use goal-setting tools to help me track my progress. It would also be helpful if the service could integrate with my existing bank accounts seamlessly and allow me to split expenses with friends and family easily. Finally, mobile check deposit would be a huge plus for me.

How often do you use mobile banking serv: As a busy small business owner, I use mobile banking services almost every day to check my account balances, transfer funds, and pay bills. I find it very convenient to be able to manage my finances on the go, without having to visit a physical bank branch.

What would make you switch to a differen: I would switch to a different digital banking service if it offered better features and functionality than my current service. For example, if a new service offered more personalized insights and recommendations based on my spending habits, or if it had a more user-friendly interface that made it easier for me to manage my finances, I would definitely consider switching. Additionally, if a new service offered better security features or lower fees than my current service, that would also be a factor in my decision to switch.

How important is it for you to have freq: As a small business owner, I value frequent engagement with my credit union through their mobile app. It's important for me to be able to access my account information quickly and easily, and to receive updates and notifications about my account activity. Additionally, if my credit union offers personalized insights and recommendations based on my spending habits, I would be more likely to engage with their mobile app on a regular basis. Overall, frequent engagement with my credit union through their mobile app is important to me because it helps me stay on top of my finances and make informed financial decisions.

What concerns do you have about using a: As a consumer, I would have concerns about the security and privacy of my personal and financial information when using a new digital banking service. I would want to know that the service has robust security measures in place to protect my data from hackers and other cyber threats. Additionally, I would want to be sure that the service is compliant with all relevant regulations and standards, and that my personal and financial information is not being shared or sold to third parties without my consent. Finally, I would want to know that the service has a reliable customer support system in place to address any issues or concerns that may arise.

On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you t: As a small business owner who values personalized insights and recommendations based on my spending habits, as well as easy-to-use goal-setting tools to help me track my progress, I would rate my likelihood of signing up for your new digital banking service as an 8 out of 10. However, my final decision would depend on factors such as the security and privacy of my personal and financial information, the reliability of the customer support system, and the fees associated with the service.

What could we do to make you more likely: To make me more likely to sign up for your new digital banking service, you could offer a free trial period or waive the initial fees for signing up. This would give me the opportunity to test out the service and see if it meets my needs and expectations before committing to a long-term subscription. Additionally, you could assure me that the service has robust security measures in place to protect my personal and financial information, and that my data will not be shared or sold to third parties without my consent. Finally, you could offer incentives such as cashback rewards or discounts on other financial products and services to encourage me to use the service more frequently and engage with your credit union on a regular basis.
